TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProcessHostPreloadClient

summary.span: 定義可以在類型中實作的介面，以便在 IIS 7.0 上執行的 ASP.NET 應用程式中預先載入該類型。

span.span: Defines an interface that can be implemented in a type in order to preload the type in an ASP.NET application that is running on IIS 7.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面是主要適用於使用非 HTTP 應用程式的 WCF 應用程式。This interface is intended primarily for use by WCF applications that are non-HTTP applications. ASP.NET 開發人員想要預先載入 ASP.NET Web 應用程式應該使用模擬的 HTTP 要求，在[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]結合`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的方法。ASP.NET developers who want to preload ASP.NET Web applications should use the simulated HTTP requests in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] combined with the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 類型和其方法僅適用於執行的應用程式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Preload(string[] parameters) cil managed

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要初始化應用程式的資料。
這個參數可以是 或空陣列。

span.span: This parameter can be or an empty array.

summary.span: 提供預先載入應用程式所需的初始化資料。

span.span: Provides initialization data that is required in order to preload the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`parameters`可以是`null`，長度為零的陣列或填入的陣列。The value of `parameters` can be `null`, a zero-length array, or a populated array. > [!NOTE] > 類型和其方法僅適用於執行的應用程式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The type and its methods apply only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)].
